name: Litelane: Lité Daré Edition
description:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 31.
A 48-hour game jam which only one person is required to make a game from scratch.

[ Entry on Ludum Dare ]

Litelane is a simple game of snake but highly mixed with TRON where you obliterate your enemies from getting longer barrier lines!

The game features options for perks, local multiplayer up to four players and customizable key settings just in-case you are not used to the default layout.

I did my best on this one, so please, take some time on enjoying the game. Especially, if you have a buddy to play with.

Default Keymaps:
Player 1 - Arrow Keys
Player 2 - WASD Keys
Player 3 - IJKL Keys
Player 4 - TFGH Keys
Esc or Enter to Pause in-game.

QUESTIONS:
If you have any questions, hit me up @furriKira on Twitter
